display_name: Medical Outcomes Study SF-36: Extent that bodily pain interefered with work
description:
Item from the Medical Outcomes Study Short Form 36 (SF-36). [Ware JE and Sherbourne CD, 1992 (PubMed ID: 1593914)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1593914/)

Original question: *8. During the past four weeks, how much did pain interfere with your normal work (including both work outside the home and housework? (Check one box.)*

[Search for all SF-36 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/shhs/variables?search=mossf36)
